headline: 'Is It Really That Simple?'—Daughter Questions A Lawyer's Advice To Her Elderly Parents: Ignore The Credit Card Bills And Debt Collectors
summary: A Reddit user recently shared a story that received a lot of attention. Posting to r/povertyfinance, the person explained how her elderly, unemployed parents in Alabama were drowning in credit card debt. After speaking with a lawyer about filing for ...
